name: Blast in the Past
description:
Blast in the Past is a First-Person Shooter inspired by classic retro games. Blast through enemies like zombies, aliens, and asteroids, until you face off against 1 of 4 final bosses

Choose a Target-Practice mini-game to warm up, and then jump into 3 different game modes, each with variations in enemies and stages


Destroy enemies and collect XP to level up


Experience 28 stages, inspired by classic retro games, in First Person Perspective


Fight in 4 Epic Boss Battles


Keep track of 56 total Medals, Trophies, and Hidden Objectives with The Achievement Board
